name: Build Trails
description: Automatically find the trails in a topology diagram.

inputParameters.name: add_auxiliary_trails
inputParameters.description: Append auxiliary trail edges to the free nodes of the topology diagram. Defaults to False.

inputParameters.name: auxiliary_trail_length
inputParameters.description: The length of the auxiliary trail edges to add. Defaults to 1.0.

inputParameters.name: auxiliary_trail_vector
inputParameters.description: The direction to which the auxiliary trail edges will initially point to. Defaults to [1.0, 1.0, 1.0].

outputParameters.name: topology
outputParameters.description: The input topology diagram. But now with computed trails.

outputParameters.name: trails
outputParameters.description: The keys of the nodes in each of the found trails.

outputParameters.name: auxiliary_trails
outputParameters.description: The keys of the appended auxiliary trail edges.
